content: Hi All. I have the "Argo 2020: Bulk Data Working Call" call on my calendar. But I can't find it in the HL7 Directory ("Conference Call Center"). Where is the directory for these calls?
http://2020.argo.run has the calendar links and project details.
Hi. Is Bulk Data still holding weekly meetings?
(Unless @Dan Gottlieb is planning to host a final post-connectathon review.)
Nope, the regular v1.5 working group calls have been wrapped up and the draft version of the IG is at http://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/bulk-data/
So will there still be a track at the connectathon in May, or is that also wrapped up?
Hi Bill -- we are considering balloting bulk v1.5 in May, and will host a connectathon track if enough folks are interested
thanks Brett. fwiw, we DPC and BCDA would likely be interested. We're looking at putting in 1.5 features into our current Bulk APIs.
